Rafael Medina. —

Designer

I create interfaces for people, I like to understand the interfaces as much as I like to design them. In other words I research what makes people tick, create, break and fix things, give design purpose and wrangle with code.

PROJECTS & STUFF

iProfile. —

UI/UX, Mobile, Android, Material Design

iProfile its a project oriented to managers in the mortgage industry, so they can see their subordinates closes, goals and overall perfomance and then take action from there to get more stats and then increase the revenue of the business. SEE MORE

Cobblestone. —

UX, Web Design, Illustration

Cobblestone was an API format converter for mortgage applications that solved by transforming their forms input data into every data storage format. SEE MORE

Unicorn. —

UI/UX, Mobile, Animation

Unicorn works as an interactive form with geo maps and digital signature to get your loan information and have it printed quickly and make it a pleasurable experience. SEE MORE
